activities: DATABASICS Inc. maintains a website www.data-basics.com where registration information is requested to see product demos and additional information regarding DATABASICS.  Name, organization, email and telephone number are requested.  Additionally, DATABASICS, provides a hosting service (Software-as-a-Service) premised and run from the USA used by customers to produce employee timesheets and expense reports.
